relating to members of your family from the past: an ancestral home ancestral rights See
ancestor
More examplesFewer examplesHer musical gifts are a kind of ancestral heritage passed to her from her grandmother. They had long planned to visit the family's ancestral homeland in the Philippines. Immigrants worry that their children will lose their ancestral tongue and values.The family has an ancestral tie to the Mohegan people through their maternal grandfather.
